definition: argumentative/quarrelsome
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

to dispute/to debate/to argue/to discuss

sentences.english: You must avoid loquacity and the man-eating person, they only annoyed.
sentences.chinese: 你要避開好辯和兇悍的人，他們徒惹煩惱。

as to/considering/for

to decide and act alone (idiom); to take arbitrary action/a law unto oneself
to play deaf-mute
